summary: This is an armor replacement for the Shrouded armor of the dark brotherhood.
descriptionHtml:
This is an armor replacement for the Shrouded armor of the dark brotherhood. It replaces the armor with the farmer clothes for males and the jester clothes for females with a unique retex.




Instructions:
Drag to your Skyrim data directory and enjoy!

Updated Version: If you downloaded the old version please delete the meshes and textures of the old files and upload the new updated version to receive all the correct changes.
If you enjoy it please endorse :)

Updated:
Added new meshes and textures making the armor unique to the Dark Brotherhood not affecting the monks, farmers, or jesters in the game. 
Changed the Meshes and Textures of the Gloves to new hand wraps as well as the Boots to the merchant boots with new textures

Credits to these changes goes to Aremeta for I could not figure it out for myself.

Big thanks to Aremeta!
author: USMCguy
